entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
